content.text:
## Exploration: project-alpha Codebase

I thoroughly explored the codebase and here are my comprehensive findings about the project structure.

### Project Structure

- src/modules/module0/index.ts: Handles module 0 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module1/index.ts: Handles module 1 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module2/index.ts: Handles module 2 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module3/index.ts: Handles module 3 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module4/index.ts: Handles module 4 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module5/index.ts: Handles module 5 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module6/index.ts: Handles module 6 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module7/index.ts: Handles module 7 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module8/index.ts: Handles module 8 initialization and exports

- src/modules/module13/index.ts: Handles module 13 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module14/index.ts: Handles module 14 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module15/index.ts: Handles module 15 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module16/index.ts: Handles module 16 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module17/index.ts: Handles module 17 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module18/index.ts: Handles module 18 initialization and exports
- src/modules/module19/index.ts: Handles module 19 initialization and exports

### API Endpoints

1. GET /api/v1/resource0 - Returns resource 0 data with pagination
2. GET /api/v1/resource1 - Returns resource 1 data with pagination
3. GET /api/v1/resource2 - Returns resource 2 data with pagination
4. GET /api/v1/resource3 - Returns resource 3 data with pagination
5. GET /api/v1/resource4 - Returns resource 4 data with pagination
6. GET /api/v1/resource5 - Returns resource 5 data with pagination
7. GET /api/v1/resource6 - Returns resource 6 data with pagination
8. GET /api/v1/resource7 - Returns resource 7 data with pagination
9. GET /api/v1/resource8 - Returns resource 8 data with pagination
10. GET /api/v1/resource9 - Returns resource 9 data with pagination
11. GET /api/v1/resource10 - Returns resource 10 data with pagination
12. GET /api/v1/resource11 - Returns resource 11 data with pagination
13. GET /api/v1/resource12 - Returns resource 12 data with pagination
14. GET /api/v1/resource13 - Returns resource 13 data with pagination
15. GET /api/v1/resource14 - Returns resource 14 data with pagination

### Database Schema

| Table | Columns | Relations |
|-------|---------|----------|
| table_0 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_-1 |
| table_1 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_0 |
| table_2 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_1 |
| table_3 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_2 |
| table_4 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_3 |
| table_5 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_4 |
| table_6 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_5 |
| table_7 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_6 |
| table_8 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_7 |
| table_9 | id, name, created_at | belongs_to table_8 |

Module 0 uses repository pattern with DI. Service layer abstracts DB. Error handling via ErrorHandler at src/common/errors.ts:42. Controllers consume services through typed interfaces.

### Key Findings

- src/common/errors.ts:42: Central error handler
- src/config/database.ts:15: Connection pool configuration
- src/middleware/auth.ts:8: JWT validation middleware
